00010 #include "GrSoftwareRTBuffer.h"
00011 
00012 #define RENDER_TILE_SIZE                8
00013 
00014 //**********************************************************
00016 //**********************************************************

00018 //==========================================================
00020 //==========================================================

00022 //----------------------------------------------------------
00023 GrSoftwareRTBuffer::GrSoftwareRTBuffer( unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00024                                                                                 unsigned int bytesPerPel )
00025 : _width( width )
00026 , _height( height )
00027 , _bytesPerPel( bytesPerPel )
00028 , _stride( 0 )
00029 , _blockStride( 0 )
00030 , _buffer( 0 )
00031 , _block( 0 )
00032 {
00034         _stride = ( ( width + 7 ) & 0xFFFFFFF8 ) * bytesPerPel;
00035         _blockStride = 8 * bytesPerPel;
00036 
00038         unsigned int allocHeight = ( ( height + 7 ) & 0xFFFFFFF8 );
00039     _buffer = ( unsigned char* )AlignedAlloc( 16, allocHeight * _stride );
00040     _block = ( unsigned char* )AlignedAlloc( 16, RENDER_TILE_SIZE * RENDER_TILE_SIZE * bytesPerPel );
00041 }
00042 
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------
00044 GrSoftwareRTBuffer::~GrSoftwareRTBuffer()
00045 {
00047         AlignedFree( _buffer );
00048         AlignedFree( _block );
00049 }
00050

00052 //==========================================================
00054 //==========================================================
00055 
00056 //----------------------------------------------------------
00057 unsigned char*
00058 GrSoftwareRTBuffer::BeginTile8x8( unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00059 {
00061         unsigned char* srcScan = _buffer + y * _stride + x * _bytesPerPel;
00062         unsigned char* dstScan = _block;
00063 
00065         for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < RENDER_TILE_SIZE; ++y )
00066         {
00067                 MemCopy( dstScan, srcScan, _blockStride );
00068                 dstScan += _blockStride;
00069                 srcScan += _stride;
00070         }
00071 
00073         return _block;
00074 }
00075 
00076 //----------------------------------------------------------
00077 unsigned char*
00078 GrSoftwareRTBuffer::BeginTile8x8WriteOnly( unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00079 {
00080         return _block;
00081 }
00082 
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------
00084 void
00085 GrSoftwareRTBuffer::EndTile8x8( unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00086 {
00088         unsigned char* srcScan = _block;
00089         unsigned char* dstScan = _buffer + y * _stride + x * _bytesPerPel;
00090 
00092         for ( unsigned int tileY = 0; tileY < RENDER_TILE_SIZE; ++tileY )
00093         {
00094                 MemCopy( dstScan, srcScan, _blockStride );
00095                 dstScan += _stride;
00096                 srcScan += _blockStride;
00097         }
00098 }

00100 //----------------------------------------------------------
00101 void
00102 GrSoftwareRTBuffer::Clear( void* pelClearData )
00103 {
00104         if ( _bytesPerPel == 2 || _bytesPerPel == 4 || _bytesPerPel == 8 || _bytesPerPel == 16 )
00105         {
00107                 static DECLARE_ALIGNED( unsigned char, clearData[ 16 ], 16 );
00108         
00110                 unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )pelClearData;
00111                 unsigned int srcMask = _bytesPerPel - 1;
00112                 for ( unsigned int c = 0; c < 16; ++c )
00113                         clearData[ c ] = src[ c & srcMask ];
00114 
00117                 B_ASSERT( ( _stride & 0xF ) == 0 );
00118 
00120                 __m128 clearValue = _mm_load_ps( ( float* )clearData );
00121                 unsigned char* dst = _buffer;
00122                 unsigned int writeCount = _stride >> 4;
00123                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < _height; ++y )
00124                 {
00125                         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < writeCount; ++i, dst += 16 )
00126                                 _mm_store_ps( ( float* )dst, clearValue );
00127                 }
00128         }
00129         else
00130         {
00131                 unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )pelClearData;
00132                 unsigned char* dstScan = _buffer;
00133                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < _height; ++y, dstScan += _stride )
00134                 {
00135                         unsigned char* dst = dstScan;
00136                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < _width; ++x, dst += _bytesPerPel )
00137                         {
00138                                 for ( unsigned int c = 0; c < _bytesPerPel; ++c )
00139                                         dst[ c ] = src[ c ];
00140                         }
00141                 }
00142         }
00143 }
